message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is worth more than $12000 to me due to its unique features and high-quality materials. To ensure you have the opportunity to experience its benefits, I am offering it to you for $15000. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for both of us. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price closer to $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
